rukus.text: 55|46|tanre raksitavinre sannidhiye bhayappettavann rant svargatteappukalunt‌
55|47|appeal ninnal iru vibhagattinreyum raksitavinre anugrahannalil etineyan ninnal nisedhikkunnat‌
55|48|pala taram sukha'aisvaryannalulla rantu (svargatteappukal)
55|49|appeal ninnal iru vibhagattinreyum raksitavinre anugrahannalil etineyan ninnal nisedhikkunnat‌
55|50|ava rantilum olukikeantirikkunna rantu aruvikalunt‌
55|51|appeal ninnal iru vibhagattinreyum raksitavinre anugrahannalil etineyan ninnal nisedhikkunnat‌
55|52|ava rantilum orea palavargattil ninnumulla i rantu inannalunt‌
55|53|appeal ninnal iru vibhagattinreyum raksitavinre anugrahannalil etineyan ninnal nisedhikkunnat‌
55|54|avar cila mettakalil cari irikkunnavarayirikkum. avayute ulbhagannal kattikutiya pattukeant nirmikkappettatakunnu. a rant teappukalileyum kaykanikal talnnu nilkkukayayirikkum
55|55|appeal ninnal iru vibhagattinreyum raksitavinre anugrahannalil etineyan ninnal nisedhikkunnat‌
55|56|avayil drsti niyantrikkunnavaraya strikaluntayirikkum. avarkk mump manusyanea, jinnea avare sparsiccittilla
55|57|appeal ninnal iru vibhagattinreyum raksitavinre anugrahannalil etineyan ninnal nisedhikkunnat‌
55|58|avar manikyavum pavilavum pealeyayirikkum
55|59|appeal ninnal iru vibhagattinreyum raksitavinre anugrahannalil etineyan ninnal nisedhikkunnat‌
55|60|nalla pravrttikkulla pratiphalam nallat ceyt keatukkalallate marru vallatumanea
55|61|appeal ninnal iru vibhagattinreyum raksitavinre anugrahannalil etineyan ninnal nisedhikkunnat‌
55|62|ava rantinum purame vereyum rantu svargatteappukalunt‌
55|63|appeal ninnal iru vibhagattinreyum raksitavinre anugrahannalil etineyan ninnal nisedhikkunnat‌
55|64|katum paccayaninna rantusvargatteappukal
55|65|appeal ninnal iru vibhagattinreyum raksitavinre anugrahannalil etineyan ninnal nisedhikkunnat‌
55|66|ava rantilum kuticcealukunna rantu aruvikalunt‌
55|67|appeal ninnal iru vibhagattinreyum raksitavinre anugrahannalil etineyan ninnal nisedhikkunnat‌
55|68|ava rantilum palavargannalunt‌. intappanakalum rumampalavumunt‌
55|69|appeal ninnal iru vibhagattinreyum raksitavinre anugrahannalil etineyan ninnal nisedhikkunnat‌
55|70|avayil sundarikalaya uttama tarunikalunt‌
55|71|appeal ninnal iru vibhagattinreyum raksitavinre anugrahannalil etineyan ninnal nisedhikkunnat‌
55|72|kutarannalil otukki nirttappetta velutta tarunikal
55|73|appeal ninnal iru vibhagattinreyum raksitavinre anugrahannalil etineyan ninnal nisedhikkunnat‌
55|74|avarkk mump manusyanea jinnea avare sparsiccittilla
55|75|appeal ninnal iru vibhagattinreyum raksitavinre anugrahannalil etineyan ninnal nisedhikkunnat‌
55|76|paccaniramulla talayanakalilum alakulla paravatanikalilum cari kitakkunnavar ayirikkum avar
55|77|appeal ninnal iru vibhagattinreyum raksitavinre anugrahannalil etineyan ninnal nisedhikkunnat‌
55|78|mahatvavum audaryavum ullavanaya ninre raksitavinre namam ulkrstamayirikkunnu
